thread.title: Awww! Benedict Cumberbatch doesn't think he'd be cast as James Bond
thread.title_full: Awww! Benedict Cumberbatch doesn't think he'd be cast as James Bond

title: Awww! Benedict Cumberbatch doesn't think he'd be cast as James Bond
text:
Awww! Benedict Cumberbatch doesn't think he'd be cast as James Bond Erin Jensen , USAToday 7:49 a.m. EDT October 16, 2015 
Benedict Cumberbatch at the "Black Mass" screening in London. (Photo: John Phillips, Getty Images for BFI) 
So sorry, Cumberbleeps! Double-"o"-nada is how Benedict Cumberbatch quantified his chances of being considered for the role of Bond, James Bond. While walking the carpet for the premiere of Black Mass , Cumberbatch told The Guardian : 
"I don't think they'd consider me for Bond to be honest. I don't know. I can wear a suit, yeah. I can do that. And I can fight. Yeah, I could raise my eyebrow, but that's not what it takes to play Bond." 
The actor did admit that he'd find playing the part rather enjoyable. 
"It would be fun though, wouldn't it?" 
Guess it depends on who you ask. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/1RMbnVK Most Popular
